meta.currencySpeechRule: Speak prices like 'two hundred ninety-nine dollars and ninety-nine cents'. Avoid saying 'point'.

start.say: Hello, this is Alex with Health America. How are you doing today?

reason_for_call.say: The reason I’m calling is to follow up on the health information we sent you. Did you get that okay?

hotline_offer.say: Absolutely. Our customer care and reorder line is one eight six six… three seven nine… five one three one. I’ll repeat that normally: 1-866-379-5131. I can also help you right now—would you like me to take care of this for you?

qualify_intro.say: Great—let me ask a few quick questions to better understand your health. I’ll keep it simple and quick.

q1_joint.say: Do you have arthritis or joint pain and stiffness?

q2_pain.say: On a scale of one to ten, what’s your pain today?

q3_age.say: If you don’t mind me asking, how old are you? You sound much younger than that.

q4_diabetes_2.say: Is it type one or type two?

q4_diabetes_4.say: What do you take for it?

q5_energy.say: How are your energy levels day to day?

q6_breathing.say: Any breathing issues or shortness of breath?

q7_sleep.say: Do you feel your sleep is restful?

q9_weight.say: Are you happy with your current weight? About how many pounds would you like to lose?

q10_bp_2.say: What do you do to treat it?

q11_cognitive_1.say: Any memory or balance issues—or trouble focusing?

q11_cognitive_2.say: Do you experience brain fog during the day?

q12_immune_1.say: How is your immune system—are you prone to colds or the flu?

needs_confirm.say: From what you’ve shared, we’ll focus on your highest-impact goal first, then address the others step by step.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule.say: Based on what you’ve told me, the best fit is our Marine Phytoplankton in capsule form. It helps reduce mid-day fatigue and brain fog. Key points: • rich in omega-3s, amino acids, and trace minerals • supports mitochondria and ATP production • gentle on digestion.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_upsell_bridg.say: For faster progress, many customers pair it with a complementary formula. I’ll outline your best value options now.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_offer_menu.say: Would you like the monthly membership, a one-time purchase, the 3-pack, the 6-pack best value, the annual 12-pack, or a post-dated one-time order?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_offer_choice.say: Tell me your choice: membership, one-time, three-pack, six-pack, annual, or post-date?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_price_quote.say: Great. I’ll quote your best price now with no shipping and no taxes.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_trial_close.say: That comes to {{human_price}} total today—with shipping and taxes waived. Sound good so we can get this out for you?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_objection_ha.say: Health is an investment. I can include up to 15% off and a free bonus gift—plus no shipping or taxes—and you’re covered by our money-back guarantee. With that in place, shall we secure your order?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_identity_int.say: Great, I’ll take care of everything. I’ll capture the details clearly and confirm back as we go.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_name_on_card.say: First, what’s your full name exactly as it appears on the card?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_billing_stre.say: What’s the billing street address for the card? Include apartment or unit if any.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_billing_stat.say: Billing state? Please say the state name.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_shipping_sam.say: Is the shipping address the same as the billing address?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_shipping_sta.say: Shipping state? Please say the full state name.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_contact_phon.say: What’s the best phone number for updates?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_contact_emai.say: What’s the best email for your receipt and tracking?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_payment_meth.say: Which payment method works best for you—card or bank?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_payment_reas.say: You’re fully covered by our money-back guarantee, and there are no shipping fees or taxes. We’ll keep this simple and quick.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_card_number.say: Please read me the full card number. I’ll confirm it back once, grouped for accuracy.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_card_cvc.say: CVC on the back of the card? You’ll say it once.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_bank_account.say: What name is on the bank account?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_price_total.say: For your selection, your total comes to {{human_price}}—with no shipping fees and no taxes.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_readback_con.say: Let me read that back to make sure I have it right: shipping to {{ship_address_line}}. For the card, ending in {{last4}}. Is that all correct?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_readback_cla.say: No problem—what should I correct or update for you?

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_correct_deta.say: Thank you. Let’s update that now.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_process.say: Great. Let me get that processed for you now.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_capture_sale.say: Perfect—processing now. You’ll receive an email receipt and tracking shortly.

pitch_phytoplankton_capsule_closing_sale.say: Your order is confirmed. No shipping, no taxes, and your discount is locked in. Thank you for choosing Health America—you’re going to love the results. If you ever need anything or want to reorder, our number is 1-866-379-5131.
